one.title: Afriq Research (website)
one.desc: Afriq Research is recently built for a client, they haven't start using the website yet, for now they are only blogging on it. I uploaded a copy of the website on my personal domain to showcase it on my portfolio.

three.title: Tek Tek (browser extension)

five.title: EasyJsonDb (library)
five.desc: EasyJsonDb is a filesystem database for Node.js. Specifically designed for testing and sample applications.

six.title: Cookied (library)
six.desc: Cookied is a tiny browser javascript library that helps managing browser cookies slightly easier.
